Scripts.OnLoad:
TMW:CInit(self)
self:SetSetting("Sound") self:SetTexts(TMW.L["SOUND_CUSTOM"], TMW.L["SOUND_CUSTOM_DESC"]) self.Header:SetText(TMW.L["SOUND_CUSTOM"])
self:CScriptAdd("ModifyValueForSave", function(self, value) value = TMW:CleanPath(value)
local number = value:match("script PlaySoundKitID%((.*)%)") if number then return number end
return value end)
self:CScriptAdd("ModifyValueForLoad", function(self, value) local Sound = TMW.EVENTS:GetEventHandler("Sound")
local listID = Sound.List and TMW.tContains(Sound.List, value)
-- If the sound is found in the LSM sounds, dont display it in this editbox. if listID then value = "" end
return value end)
self:CScriptAdd("SettingSaved", function(self) local soundFile = self:GetText()
local warningText if tonumber(soundFile) then -- this is ok - its a soundkit ID elseif not strfind(soundFile, "%.[^\\/]+$") then -- Warn about no extensions warningText = soundFile ~= "" and TMW.L["SOUNDERROR1"] elseif strfind(strlower(soundFile), "%.wav$") and select(4, GetBuildInfo()) > 40000 then -- Custom wav files are no longer allowed. -- Don't force it to be nothing, because the user might be entering a built-in wav file, -- which is still valid. warningText = TMW.L["SOUNDERROR2"] elseif not (strfind(strlower(soundFile), "%.ogg$") or strfind(strlower(soundFile), "%.mp3$")) then -- Only ogg and mp3 are supported. warningText = TMW.L["SOUNDERROR3"] end
if warningText then TMW.HELP:Show{ code = "SND_INVALID_CUSTOM", icon = nil, relativeTo = self, x = 0, y = 0, text = format(warningText) } else TMW.HELP:Hide("SND_INVALID_CUSTOM") end end)
Scripts.OnUpdate: local SoundList = self:GetParent().SoundList -- Keep the custom box anchored to the end of the list if the scroll frame -- isn't extending to the bottom of the page. if SoundList.ScrollFrame:GetVerticalScrollRange() == 0 then local Sound = TMW.EVENTS:GetEventHandler("Sound") self:SetPoint("TOP", SoundList.frames[#Sound.List], "BOTTOM", 0, -20) else self:SetPoint("TOP", SoundList.ScrollFrame, "BOTTOM", 0, -20) end
